name: Ataraxis Profiles
overview:
Established in the year 2012 we “Ataraxis Profiles” are the prominent manufacturers, suppliers & exporters of UPVC Windows and Doors. Our product range includes a wide range of Open Windows, Sliding Windows, Top Open Windows, UPVC Sound Proof Windows, Arch Windows, Tilt and Turn Windows, Fixed Windows, UPVC Doors, UPVC Bi Folding Doors and lot more.

Our Infrastructure: Our company possesses a well-structured and state-of-the-art infrastructure, which helps in developing qualitative and bulk products within the scheduled time period. Here, we have installed latest equipment and machineries to carry out our production operations. We continuously upgrade them to keep ourselves in pace with the current market demands.

Quality Assurance: We are known as the quality-oriented organization across the nation. To ensure that our offered array of doors and windows fulfills the demands of clients, we manufacture it by utilizing premium quality PVC. These products are manufactured with precision and advanced machineries to provide the best at clients’ end.

Our Team: Quality controllers Technicians Warehousing and packaging experts R&D professionals Skilled workers Sales and marketing personnel

Client Satisfaction: With our efficiency and accuracy, we always manage to stand all on the expectations and demands of our valued customers. Suggestions and criticism is always taken positively at our end that helps us perform better in accordance with the clients’ needs. Our primary focus is to provide maximum level of clients’ satisfaction.
